verses.verse: The burden <S%H4853><s%> of the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> for Israel <S%H3478><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, which stretcheth <S%H5186><s%> forth the heavens <S%H8064><s%>, and layeth the foundation <S%H3245><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>, and formeth <S%H3335><s%> the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of man <S%H120><s%> within <S%H7130><s%> him.

Behold, I will make <S%H7760><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> a cup <S%H5592><s%> of trembling <S%H7478><s%> unto all the people <S%H5971><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>, when they shall be in the siege <S%H4692><s%> both against Judah <S%H3063><s%> and against Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>.

¶ And in that day <S%H3117><s%> will I make <S%H7760><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> a burdensome <S%H4614><s%> stone <S%H68><s%> for all people <S%H5971><s%>: all that burden <S%H6006><s%> themselves with it shall be cut in pieces <S%H8295><s%> <S%H8295><s%>, though all the people <S%H1471><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> be gathered together <S%H622><s%> against it.

In that day <S%H3117><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, I will smite <S%H5221><s%> every horse <S%H5483><s%> with astonishment <S%H8541><s%>, and his rider <S%H7392><s%> with madness <S%H7697><s%>: and I will open <S%H6491><s%> mine eyes <S%H5869><s%> upon the house <S%H1004><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, and will smite <S%H5221><s%> every horse <S%H5483><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> with blindness <S%H5788><s%>.

And the governors <S%H441><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> shall say <S%H559><s%> in their heart <S%H3820><s%>, The inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> shall be my strength <S%H556><s%> in the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> their God <S%H430><s%>.

¶ In that day <S%H3117><s%> will I make <S%H7760><s%> the governors <S%H441><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> like an hearth <S%H3595><s%> of fire <S%H784><s%> among the wood <S%H6086><s%>, and like a torch <S%H3940><s%> of fire <S%H784><s%> in a sheaf <S%H5995><s%>; and they shall devour <S%H398><s%> all the people <S%H5971><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>, on the right hand <S%H3225><s%> and on the left <S%H8040><s%>: and Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> shall be inhabited <S%H3427><s%> again in her own place, even in Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>.

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> also shall save <S%H3467><s%> the tents <S%H168><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> first <S%H7223><s%>, that the glory <S%H8597><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> and the glory <S%H8597><s%> of the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> do not magnify <S%H1431><s%> themselves against Judah <S%H3063><s%>.

In that day <S%H3117><s%> shall the LORD <S%H3068><s%> defend <S%H1598><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>; and he that is feeble <S%H3782><s%> among them at that day <S%H3117><s%> shall be as David <S%H1732><s%>; and the house <S%H1004><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> shall be as God <S%H430><s%>, as the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them.
¶ And it shall come to pass in that day <S%H3117><s%>, that I will seek <S%H1245><s%> to destroy <S%H8045><s%> all the nations <S%H1471><s%> that come <S%H935><s%> against Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>.

And I will pour <S%H8210><s%> upon the house <S%H1004><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%>, and upon the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>, the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of grace <S%H2580><s%> and of supplications <S%H8469><s%>: and they shall look <S%H5027><s%> upon me whom they have pierced <S%H1856><s%>, and they shall mourn <S%H4553><s%> for him, as one mourneth <S%H5594><s%> for his only <S%H3173><s%> son, and shall be in bitterness <S%H4843><s%> for him, as one that is in bitterness <S%H4843><s%> for his firstborn <S%H1060><s%>.

In that day <S%H3117><s%> shall there be a great <S%H1431><s%> mourning <S%H4553><s%> in Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>, as the mourning <S%H4553><s%> of Hadadrimmon <S%H1910><s%> in the valley <S%H1237><s%> of Megiddon <S%H4023><s%>.

And the land <S%H776><s%> shall mourn <S%H5594><s%>, every <S%H4940><s%> family <S%H4940><s%> apart <S%H905><s%>; the family <S%H4940><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> apart, and their wives <S%H802><s%> apart; the family <S%H4940><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Nathan <S%H5416><s%> apart, and their wives <S%H802><s%> apart;

The family <S%H4940><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%> apart, and their wives <S%H802><s%> apart; the family <S%H4940><s%> of Shimei <S%H8097><s%> apart, and their wives <S%H802><s%> apart;
All the families <S%H4940><s%> that remain <S%H7604><s%>, every family <S%H4940><s%> apart, and their wives <S%H802><s%> apart.
